articles.title: "Wish I Can Be A Man," Says China's Zheng Qinwen As Stomach Cramps End French Open Bid - NDTV Sports
articles.description: China's Zheng Qinwen said severe stomach cramps ruined her hopes of completing a shock French Open win against world number one Iga Swiatek on Monday.
articles.content: China's Zheng Qinwen said severe stomach cramps ruined her hopes of completing a shock French Open win against world number one Iga Swiatek on Monday and left her wishing "I can be a man". Zheng, jus… [+2087 chars]

articles.description: IPL 2022:Kumar Sangakkara gives BOLD STATEMENT on R Ashwin after RR's final loss, says 'he needs to think of IMPROVEMENT
